name: Advertaken
tagline: A Website For All Your Creative Marketing Needs
body:
## About Our Company

### 
Advertaken is a small group of professionals, who take pride in their ability to understand the minds of a diverse clientele. We are a marketing company that specializes in Video Marketing & Copywriting for local businesses. Our company is fascinated by the written word, but also find it thrilling to be able to translate ideas to connect to the world. With our expanded reach we are able to better meet our clients demand for an all inclusive experience.


***

## Our Services

1. Video Production & Marketing
2. Ready-made Videos
3. Content Writing
4. Professional Resumes
5. Press Release Writing

***
